name: hgjs_build
packageJsonDescribe: this package.json file is only for development. the real package.json file was under src/

scripts.pre-build: npm run clean && npm run distPackageJson
scripts.build: npm run pre-build && babel src -d dist
scripts.watch: npm run pre-build && babel src -d dist --watch
scripts.publish: npm run productBuild && cd dist && npm publish
